texts.value: Kinase involved in initiation of DNA replication. Phosphorylates critical substrates that regulate the G1/S phase transition and initiation of DNA replication, such as MCM proteins and CLASPIN

Forms a complex with either DBF4/DBF4A or DBF4B, leading to the activation of the kinase activity (PubMed:10373557, PubMed:12065429, PubMed:15668232, PubMed:17062569). Interacts with CLASPIN (via the acidic patch); the interaction is required for phosphorylation of MCM proteins and CLASPIN (PubMed:27401717)
A number of isoforms may be produced.
Belongs to the protein kinase superfamily. Ser/Thr protein kinase family. CDC7 subfamily

features.description: Glycyl lysine isopeptide (Lys-Gly) (interchain with G-Cter in SUMO2)
